attributes.action: Give the Dawlish Sea Wall Railway Line Protected Status
attributes.additional_details:
The Dawlish Sea Wall segment has been running for 168 years and is as such a key Historical element of this Countries Victorian era.

It is now under threat of relocation due to damage caused by the elements/weather.

I believe this line should be given protected status due to the possible desires of property/land developers changing this historical element of our National heritage.

Give the Dawlish Sea Wall protected status.
